column4: and wonderful ambience. We went to Bavetts last night with another couple. Our server was very knowledgable and helpful when it came to selecting menu options. I had the meatloaf
column5: which was perfect. We did order the wedge salad earlier in the meal with the bacon on the side. I ended up eating some of the bacon with my meatloaf-highly recommend that little trick. Really
column6: everything from the bread to start the meal to the chocolate pie and whiskey ice cream for dessert was outstanding!
